body.name: Snuggle Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets, Blue Sparkle, 200 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 15 mins
features: Snuggle's original Blue Sparkle scent is a fresh and clean blend of white floral and bright green citrus notes that snuggle up to warm woody notes and soft musk for a comforting, long-lasting freshness your family will love.
In addition to using in the dryer to make your clothes feel softer, dryer sheets can also be used in a variety of places like closets, gym bags, suitcases, and cars to make them smell fresh.
For long-lasting freshness and static reduction, add a Snuggle brand dryer sheet to every load you dry. Place the sheet on top of wet clothes and start the dryer cycle as usual. Discard after use.
Safe for standard and high efficiency (HE) dryers.
Includes one box of 200 dryer sheets.
body.description: Snuggle Original Blue sparkle scent is a fresh and clean blend of white floral and bright green citrus notes that Snuggle up to warm woody notes and soft musk for a comforting, long-lasting freshness your family will love. In addition to using in the dryer to make your clothes feel softer, dryer sheets can also be used in a variety of places like closets, gym bags, suitcases, and cars to make them smell fresh. For long-lasting freshness and static reduction, add a Snuggle brand dryer sheet to every load you dry. Place the sheet on top of wet clothes and start the dryer cycle as usual. Discard after use. Safe for standard and HE dryers. Includes one box of 200 dryer sheets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Snuggle Scent Shakes In-Wash Scent Boosters go directly in the washer and are formulated to help eliminate tough odors. Snuggle Blue Sparkle Fabric Softener gives you the Snuggly Softness that feels good and the long lasting freshness your family loves. In addition to making your clothes feel soft, Snuggle Blue Sparkle Dryer Sheets can also be used in closets, gym bags, and cars to provide freshness your family will love.

Snuggle Blue Sparkle Dryer Sheets Snuggle Blue Sparkle 2X Liquid Fabric Softener Snuggle Blue Sparkle Scent Shakes Snuggle SuperCare Lilies and Linen Dryer Sheets Snuggle SuperCare Lilies and Linen 2X Liquid Fabric Softener Snuggle SuperCare Lilies and Linen Scent Booster Snuggly Softness ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Long Lasting Freshness ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Controls Static ✓ ✓ Reduces Wrinkles ✓ ✓ Fade Protection ✓ ✓ Wear & Tear Protection ✓ Color Run Protection ✓ Fiber Care Technology ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars **Snuggle Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets, Blue Sparkle, 200 Count**
reviews.reviewText: **Snuggle Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets, Blue Sparkle, 200 Count** is a must-have for anyone who wants to keep their clothes feeling soft and smelling fresh. The original Blue Sparkle scent is a delightful blend of white floral and bright green citrus notes that snuggle up to warm woody notes and soft musk for a comforting, long-lasting freshness your family will love.These dryer sheets are not only great for use in the dryer, but they can also be used in a variety of places like closets, gym bags, suitcases, and cars to make them smell fresh. I love how versatile they are!For long-lasting freshness and static reduction, I add a Snuggle brand dryer sheet to every load I dry. I place the sheet on top of wet clothes and start the dryer cycle as usual. Discard after use. These dryer sheets are safe for standard and high efficiency (HE) dryers.The box comes with 200 dryer sheets, which is a great value for the price. I appreciate that these dryer sheets are affordable and effective. They leave my clothes feeling soft and smelling great, and I love that they help reduce static cling and wrinkles.Overall, I highly recommend **Snuggle Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets, Blue Sparkle, 200 Count** to anyone looking for an affordable and effective way to keep their clothes feeling soft and smelling fresh. Give them a try and you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delightful smell and impeccable softness
reviews.reviewText: Snuggle Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets in the Blue Sparkle variant have become an absolute essential in my laundry routine, offering a trifecta of affordability, delightful fragrance, and impeccable softness.One of the standout features of these dryer sheets is the unbeatable price. The 200-count pack not only provides exceptional value for money but also ensures that you have a long-lasting supply of softness for your laundry needs. The budget-friendly aspect is especially appreciated given the consistently high quality of the product.The Blue Sparkle scent is a game-changer in the world of fabric softeners. It imparts a fresh and invigorating aroma to my clothes that lasts long after they've been taken out of the dryer. The fragrance strikes the perfect balance between being noticeable and not overpowering, adding an extra layer of cleanliness and freshness to every load.The effectiveness in softening clothes is exceptional. These dryer sheets leave my garments feeling incredibly soft, reducing static cling and making them a joy to wear. The softness is particularly noticeable with items like towels and bed linens, enhancing the overall comfort and coziness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work, decent value
reviews.reviewText: They work, decent value. Good scent, somewhat strong. My friend uses scent-free sheets and I am starting to like those, but these work fine, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snuggle is the best
reviews.reviewText: Nice scent, almost like a musky perfume, not chemically smelling at all. Great static reducer. Good value for the money, only have to use 1 sheet most of the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They smell great but the.product was open when I got the box and the box was open too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and smells wonderful!
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell of Snuggle. I think it smells better than the brands that are several dollars more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don't like liquid fabric softener, and I hate the smell of Downy.....
reviews.reviewText: So these have been my go-to dryer sheets for decades. I use them for static-cling and they work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good static elimination and plenty of scent.
reviews.reviewText: Good choice for bulk dryer sheets. The batch I got work well against static and have strong, but not overwhelming, scent. Depending on load variables, it is not uncommon for me to get mort than one use from a sheet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The smell is great , 1 sheet is enough for the load
Este produto é excelente. Deixa a roupa super macia e a cheirar muito bem
